Review.Titre: I would like to give you a zero rating17/22/23.
Review.Contenu: I would like to give you a zero rating.I've been a customer of Tesco mobile for more years than l care to remember. I topped up my account in the usual manner on 17/12/23 but this was not added to my account until 18/12/23 but l was messaged to say that this was in my rocket pack on17/12/23 this is a monthly to up. My credit ran out  19/12/23 customer service closed l had to top up again text again to say accepted now lm being told l topped up into a different account and l cannot get a refund.  I have been charged twice for my monthly top  up. Date of review should read 17/12 /23.

Review.Titre: You have taken money from my bank…
Review.Contenu: You have taken money from my bank account 3 times recently without my permission. I can't block you or change my card number because your app doesn't allow that. Please stop using my card now and refund the last 3 withdrawals. You have ignored my request.  I don't want to use fonoma anymore

I did send a recharge to cuba and my relative NEVER got it !!! despite I DID SENT TO FONOMA a screen capture of the phone shoving NO balance from TWO consecutive charges , fonoma denied my claim, as a result I lost about 65 canadian dollars the value of those two undelivered charges

Review.Titre: One of the worst experiences that I…
Review.Contenu: One of the worst experiences that I never experienced in my live. I sent a cell recharge to my daughter in Cuba that she never got. And on top of that I has been dealing for a solution for.over a week without any explanation of what happened. NOT RECOMENDED Una de mis experiencias mas terrible en mi vida. Le envie una recarga de cell a mi hija en Cuba la cual nunca fue entregada. Llevo mas de una semana lidiando con la situacion sin una explicacion de a donde fue a parar o una solucion. NO LE RECOMIENDO USAR ESTE SITIO DEL TODO.

I purchased over $70 promo a month ago under another account for my other number just to realize that I had limited data and I couldn't use my full purchase on what I need which is data. Also, 2.5gb's for $12+USD is a rip off, data shouldn't cost that much.

Review.Titre: Better if could schedule future recharges
Review.Contenu: Would be better if you were able to schedule recharges ahead of time—OR to be able to send it, but not have it start until the receiver chooses to or opens it.The best thing of course would be for there not to be a time limit, and for it to be usage based so it can carry over months if not used much. Very, very expensive for very little—I hope this suggestions are taken to mind. You’ll have a lot more users if they are.

Review.Contenu: If I recharge a mobil in Cuba, I pay more than 20€ for one month. The people received maximum 4GB, and half an hour to call, and 50sms internacionalIn my country I pay 20€ and i have 8GB and i can call without limit.This is a big difference. I think that Fonoma can do beter to help the poor people en Cuba. The crisis es hard. The people have no tourist ... So there live is not that simple

Review.Contenu: If it was not for double rechages jan 27 2019 and feb 9 2020 not caused by me I would of givin you a 5 star.I tried to contact you after feb 9th but got not reply.Another double recharge on dec 29 2019 was my error but not those after that date as I was very careful.I did use Ding after that but retried Fonomabecause of your kind operators.

Review.Titre: Might be 0 stars after this....
Review.Contenu: It would have been 5 stars... But the last recharge I sent did not go through... My payment for it went through, but they never got there re charge and they are a 3rd party so the have to wait for some other company to investigate it... So I don't know if they will make it right and either give them the re charge, refund my money... I would prefer for them to just provide the re charge that I paid for already on August 8th and it is now August 12th with no resolution, I got a confirmation email from Fanoma saying it went through ant approximately 1 A.M. on August 9th... This is ridiculous and should not take this long and if they don't make it right then this will go from a 3 star to a 0 star real fast...

Review.Titre: I am not sure why the company switches…
Review.Contenu: I am not sure why the company switches from CUP To CUC and back for different advertising deals, it was confusing and I think that I got shafted once because of not understanding the differences.

Review.Titre: Good & Bad ~
Review.Contenu: Good & Bad ~ I like the service quite a bit. It is easy to use and reliable with very good customer service. An essential service for keeping in contact with Cuba. 5 stars here. BUT I find the exchange rate charged on CAD to USD very high. There is a Fonoma service fee, of course, that makes sense, yet Fonoma adds an extra 4% to exchange. The current exchange rate is 76% although I know no one ever sees the exact exchange. The exchange I received was 72%. For the 20CUC recarga, instead of costing approximately $26.30 + Service Fee, I was charged $36+ CAD by the time it comes to my account. In my opinion, that's very high. If I can find a more affordable, yet equally reliable service, I will be sure to change my habit of using Fonoma.

Review.Titre: The recharges go through without a…
Review.Contenu: The recharges go through without a problem. The Cuban people are paying too much for phone service and limited internet. It's more expensive than we pay for unlimited services in Canada and the USA.

Review.Contenu: No is the services, but the offers are very expensive compared to the rest of the world. I suppose part of the problem is, the company's internal market analysis.

Review.Titre: Fast and easy way of charging cellphones
Fonoma is great, could be even better
Review.Contenu: Fonoma is great!  One thing could make it better. It would be nice if you could add a phone charge to a "cart", and then add others to the same cart before checking out.  I usually send 4 phone charges to different people at a time, and it's a little annoying to have to keep performing the same steps for every charge.

Review.Titre: Last week
Review.Contenu: Last week, I was in Cuba and my sold have become  verry low to me and I was afraid to not have suficiently minutes to can use my phone before come back at Canada. Like I can't use my credit card to make me more credit on my line, I ask to my friend, in Canada, to make this for me. So, it had been so hard to her, to can understand with you to make the transaction for the tranfer. Hours had been necesary to can complete the transaction, some calls and verifications without end. Then, she told me that had been very hard and was near to cancel the bought before at least, I finaly receve the charge.

Review.Titre: Good service
Review.Contenu: Good service, just a couple of points as feedback:1. It would be great to be able to send multiple recharges at the same time, meaning being able to send recharges to multiple numbers at the same time.2. Often my Paypal payment is on hold for an hour or so after the second recharge, "being verified" not sure why that is, for verified customers, this shouldn't be the case.

Review.Titre: Expensive, but reliable.
Review.Contenu: I have not had any problems with the service at Fonoma, but I have to limit recharges to when there are discounts. The service is too expensive otherwise. Nevertheless, I consider the service essential for people with families and friends in Cuba. I am thankful their service is available. If the normal rates were cheaper, I would send recharges more often.

Review.Titre: The service is fairly east to use…
Review.Contenu: The service is fairly east to use however one thing you could add, unless its there and I don't see it is to have an English, French or other option on the home page. Here in Canada Eng & Fre are the common languages spoken. It would help to understand what you are doing. Right now I just go thru the motions from memory. If your site or procedure ever changed, I would never been able to recharge a phone because I wouldn't understand anything.

Review.Titre: I enjoy the service and the direct…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy the service and the direct contact with your staff they are very lovely, it would be nice though to have an emergency contact for countries like Cuba where things can get complicated as my aim is to help my friends there but as i am sure you are aware things are not always easy with the services in Cuba.So far so good so hope to continue to use your services for the long future. Offers are great maybe if possible amounts that can go into their main balance so that it can be used longer than a month?just expressing a wish that's all. thank you.

Review.Titre: Well
Review.Contenu: Well, you are Almost 5 Star Fenoma. JejeAlso good to see you Ask customers to help make you better. Democracy.))Wish we could also send Money to Cuban Friends and Family via Fenoma.You are very good now informing me when you have special rates on sending recargas to Cuba.Buenos tardes))

Review.Titre: Great service!!
Review.Contenu: Great service!!However, we are trying to help our Episcopal Cuban friends in Vertientes, and it’d be truly wonderful if you would provide the bulk discount for under 10 lines/month ... Please consider this under the dire pandemic circumstances in Cuba.Many thanks!LB

Review.Titre: My first experiences with using Fonoma…
Review.Contenu: My first experiences with using Fonoma was a bit annoying because there seemed to have been a constant delay and request for additional authorization, I think if I entered the correct login and card information, there should no need for any additional.  To me, the process was flowed; I don't seem to have that issue anymore.

Review.Titre: I had a small problem with a…
Review.Contenu: I had a small problem with a advertisement that talked about promotion. The period of this promotion was not clearly seen. Better to put promotion and validity period together so that it is transparent. Thank you Angelo Frate

Review.Titre: keeping in touch
Review.Contenu: Thank you for the oportunity to keep in touch with the loved ones. Also very pleased that you offer a recharge at 10$. Everytume I had an issue your team was very helpful. The only thing is sometimes the recharge doesn’t go the right day when there is a promoción and in those cases an extra dy should be added. I know it is not Fonoma’s fault but ETECSA is robing data maybe you could put some pressure on them.

Review.Titre: Recharging is easy
Review.Contenu: Recharging is easy. But its inconvenient that cubatel has no english version of the recharge module. And it gives not much insight of the possibilities a recharge give. For foreigners who are used to unlimited data for landlines, reasonable amounts of data for cellulars and mostly free calls its weird.

Review.Titre: Great service
Review.Contenu: Great service, fast, with a website easy to use.However, a few months ago, I had registered my credit card number in my account, and a hacker used my credit card the day after I sent recharges. Not sure it’s related but I think it is as it’s the only website where I had registered this card. Now I erase the card number after each purchase. Anyways, still using Fonoma !

Review.Titre: Just one bad experience.
Review.Contenu: Quite satisfied, but I once had a very bad experience with the site. I sent a recharge and something went wrong (no matter what). I made the correction and sent it again. Than after, I realize that the phone number had changed. So either make sure to keep the data previously seized on the page, or at least, empty the field(s). As a computer science teacher I was disappointed and upset for sending to someone else, against my will.I intend to use Fonoma Business soon. I seems to be convenient for my needs.

Review.Titre: Hi everybody
Review.Contenu: Hi everybody.  I been using Fonoma for sometime by now and I have no problem.  And when I had any issue I contact customer service and they help me so what could I say  . The only thing I DON'T like it's the 4 Dallas I have to pay for one recharge I think it could be better. THANKS a lot for your service.

Review.Titre: Service
Review.Contenu: Service, the app, et.cetera are perfect! The only thing is that they are a little to expensive. With another company you get the same recharge for almost 3 euros less. If you recharge reguarly, in my case 2 or 3 times a month, the difference is to big.Even if you get a discount step by step you can use to reduce the price.

Review.Titre: Works well, safe
Review.Contenu: Saves my contacts

Review.Titre: Could have better deals for the price...
Review.Contenu: I am truly happy with the services but seriously i find the recharges for us Canadian people with money exchange extremely expensive for what they receive.  It is always for someone outside Cuba most of the time that has to help them out with their phones.....Cannot give 5 stars because it can be better

Review.Titre: Sending recargas with fonoma is easy…
Review.Contenu: Sending recargas with fonoma is easy and fast, I would only like to also be able to send multiple recargas with one payment and not have pay each recarga individually. Or maybe if this is alredy possible the instructions would have to be clearer.

Review.Titre: I would have given you 5 stars but once…
Review.Contenu: I would have given you 5 stars but once or twice I felt I got ripped off because I did not get the bonus . I blamed your ads as being misleading . Right now I am satisfied though as I have had smooth transactions for the last several months .Thank you and keep up your good work .

Review.Titre: Good service
Review.Contenu: Good service. Only thing I'd like a little bit more, for example if I send a recharge of 20 cuc, you put a bonus of 40 cuc but on local call only. Since I'm in Canada, would it be possible to put like 20 cuc on bonus megabits,and 20 on local call? Any constructive feedback would be welcome

Review.Titre: Thank you for the promotions!
Review.Contenu: I prefer the previous promotion to the currant one.  I wish you could get the promotions all the time, for someone who sends as many recharges as I do.  I am still happy that we have Fonoma and I am able to send recharges to Cuba from Canada instantly.  Thank you for that!  Sincerely, Cathy

Review.Titre: Fonoma has a good recharge services to…
Review.Contenu: Fonoma has a good recharge services to Cuba cellphone.  It's support service is great and always be in improve. My only opinion is for grow it's market with others services like money transfer to Cuba bank accounts.

Review.Titre: usualy the servise is good .
Revise terms
Review.Contenu: It is good to be able to send credit but wish it could last longer than a month. Also, some people in Cuba don’t have 4 G capacity on mobiles so the data part of promotion is useless to them. Maybe a few revisions to give better value to Cubans receiving the credit.

Review.Titre: How to pay CUP
Review.Contenu: Ya, it's good overall, using few years..but why cubans can't recharging Cuba got using own card and pay w CUP (how you promote)?! It's kinda tricky...not really even close 20 cuc o 500cup..almost double come to!Thanks 😊

Review.Titre: Love all the notices
Review.Contenu: Love all the notices they give , especially when special is onOn the whole , service is prompt One thing I do not like , is constantly having to ask for it to be sent in English They do not for what ever reason understand and very frustrating

Review.Titre: Fonoma is a fast efficient way to send…

Review.Titre: I am not happy with buying into the…

Review.Titre: I find the service very fast and…
